name: Tile entity detection fix
body:
**IMPORTANT:** This build works with Minecraft 1.18.1, it should also work with the older versions. it was tested against the latest release of WorldEdits 7.2.8, and it should work with NBT data.

# Changes:

* Fixed log spam when starting the plugin
* Fixed tile entity detection


# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.2.5, and latest 7.3.0 DEV. It might work with recent dev snapshots but as a general rule dev builds are not supported.

name: Minecraft 1.18
body:
**IMPORTANT:** This build works with Minecraft 1.18, it should also work with the older versions. it was tested against the latest version of WorldEdits Dev build 7.2.8, and it should work with NBT data. Since this build is based on dev build of WorldEdit please consider it as experimental, and that it might break without any warning with new versions of WorldEdit.

# Changes:

* Minecraft 1.18 compatibility


# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.2.5, and latest 7.3.0 DEV. It might work with recent dev snapshots but as a general rule dev builds are not supported.

**IMPORTANT:** This build works with Minecraft 1.17 (and earlier), it was tested against the latest version of WorldEdits Dev build, and it should work with NBT data.

# Changes:

* Further fixes for Java 16 compatibility
* Undo block ghosting.


# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.2.5, and latest 7.3.0 DEV. It might work with recent dev snapshots but as a general rule dev builds are not supported.

name: A leap forward...
body:
**IMPORTANT:** This build works with Minecraft 1.17 (and earlier), although at the time of release there is no Minecraft 1.17 compatible version of WorldEdit, therefore all NBT related operations will not work. You might have luck with new DEV versions (when they are released) but at this moment its a lottery, they might work they might not.
For a regular release you should expect a new version of AWE not sooner then next weekend (if no critical bugs are reported and new builds of WE are available).

# Changes:

* Further fixes for Java 16 compatibility
* Latest WorldEdit dev build support (2021.05.27)


# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.2.5, and latest 7.3.0 DEV. It might work with recent dev snapshots but as a general rule dev builds are not supported.

name: WorldEdit 7.2.0-beta-03 compatibility
body:
# IMPORTANT:
In this version I (finally) added support for java 12+. The plugin was tested with java 8 all up to 14. It worked without any issues but please note that I'm testing on a bare-bone server (WE + AWE only) and it might not be compatible with all plugins when you use java 12+. I consider the support for java 12+ experimental/beta, therefore I still do not recommend it if its absolutely not needed. That said if you experience problems while running the plugin on java 12 send me a PM with the error and full server startup log.
# Changes:

* Fixed WorldEdit 7.2.0-beta-03 compatibility
* Fixed raise and lower brush

# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.2.0-beta-03, it won't work with any older version of WorldEdit. It might work with dev snapshots but as a general rule dev builds are not supported.

# IMPORTANT:
In this version I (finally) added support for java 12+. The plugin was tested with java 8 all up to 14. It worked without any issues but please note that I'm testing on a bare-bone server (WE + AWE only) and it might not be compatible with all plugins when you use java 12+. I consider the support for java 12+ experimental/beta, therefore I still do not recommend it if its absolutely not needed. That said if you experience problems while running the plugin on java 12 send me a PM with the error and full server startup log.

# Changes:

* Fixed WorldEdit 7.2.0-beta-02 compatibility,
* Fixed 3d biome support
* Updated local session wrapper
* Fix distr command

name: Fixes and WE 7.2.0-beta
body:
# IMPORTANT:
In this version I (finally) added support for java 12+. The plugin was tested with java 8 all up to 14. It worked without any issues but please note that I'm testing on a bare-bone server (WE + AWE only) and it might not be compatible with all plugins when you use java 12+. I consider the support for java 12+ experimental/beta, therefore I still do not recommend it if its absolutely not needed. That said if you experience problems while running the plugin on java 12 send me a PM with the error and full server startup log.

# Changes:

* World Edit 7.2.0-beta compatibility
* Biome chang serialization fix
* Added new classes to class scanner black list
* Fixed empty file undo
* Add nbt strip support
* Minor code cleanup

# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.2.0-beta, it won't work with any older version of WorldEdit.

name: Java 12+
body:
# MPORTANT:
In this version I (finally) added support for java 12+. The plugin was tested with java 8 all up to 14. It worked without any issues but please note that I'm testing on a bare-bone server (WE + AWE only) and it might not be compatible with all plugins when you use java 12+. I consider the support for java 12+ experimental/beta, therefore I still do not recommend it if its absolutely not needed. That said if you experience problems while running the plugin on java 12 send me a PM with the error and full server startup log.

# Changes:

* Removed reflection (wherever possible)
* Added safe reflection (where needed)
* Added support for java 12+
* More robust injector,
* Fixed undo not working if invoked form another plugin,
* More aggressive physics freeze,
* Fixed setblock ignoring black list,
* Fixed setting content of chests,
* Optimization of wrappers (should help with world guard issues)
* Other minor fixes,
    Project cleanup

# Please read:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4 and WE 6.1.7.3.

This version was build and tested against WorldEdit 7.1.0, it won't work with any older version of WorldEdit. Because of the changes in WorldEdit 7.2.0-DEV this version won't work so don't even try it.

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.20
body:

* Fixed regen command
* Fixed deadlock on chunk force load
* Added option to cancel all operations for all users
* Speedup of undo command
* Speedup of redo command

name: Minecraft 1.15 and compatibility fixes
body:

* Fixed minecraft 1.15.2 compatibility,

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.16
body:
# Changelog:
* Support for WorldEdit 7.1.0-beta1
* Support for Minecraft 1.15
* Fixed disallowed black list for permission group load,
* Fix undo null ptr,
* Add better event handling error log,
* Fix operation time calculation,
* Fix block placing for infinite block amount,
* Fix speed change command,
* Added support to disable async for tools,
* New configuration options:
  * Physics freeze blacklist customization
  * Class scanner blacklist customization
  * Number of average points for BPS calculation
* Tools/Brushes
  * Initialize tools on session creation
  * Support for navigation wand
* More robust injector
* Fix error handling for task dispatcher
* Fix configuration loading

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.11
body:
# Changelog:
* fixed null pointer when using chunk batching
* restore support for WE 7.0.0

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.10
body:
# Changelog:
* fixed some operations not working in async
* added compatibility for WE 7.0.1
* fixed undo crashing
* fixed move crashing
* fixed copy crashing
* added compatibility for WE 7.0.1
* rewritten block get
* fixed NBT data not copied (empty chest bug)
* added progress bar for stage 1
* speedup and optimization of clipboard copy
* optimization of iterators

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.4
body:
# Class scanner fixes

## Release notes:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13+ it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4. It was build and tested against WorldEdit RC-3, it won't work with any older version of WorldEdit. It might work with latest dev builds but this is not guaranteed.

This version was tested on: Spigot 1.13.2, Spigot 1.14.1, Paper 1.13.2, Paper 1.14.1

## Changes:
* fixed bug in class scanner causing server timeout

## Installation (upgrading from beta):
To update to the beta please:
* remove the old AWE
* install the new jar and restart the server.

## Installation (upgrading from alpha or 3.5.4):
If this is the first time you install the 3.6 beta version please:
* remove AWE injector,
* remove the old AWE
* remove the plugins/asyncworldedit/plugins directory
* remove the plugins/asyncworldedit/installed file
* install the new jar and restart the server.

## Release notes:
This release is designed to work on Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13, 1.13.1 , 1.13.2, 1.14, 1.14.1 it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4. * install the new jar and restart the server.

Release version for Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13, 1.13.1 , 1.13.2, 1.14, 1.14.1 it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use old version 3.5.4

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.0-rc-04
body:
# Release notes:
This release is a release candidate version for Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13, 1.13.1 , 1.13.2 it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use [old version 3.5.4](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/releases/tag/v3.5.4).

The version was built against WorldEdit v7.0.0-beta-03 and won't work with any older build. It was tested on the latest spigot (MC: 1.13.2). As of now nightly/dev builds of WorldEdit won't be supported. Only beta and final releases of WorldEdit will be supported.

**For everyone using PlotMe:** as I already said support for PlotMe is officially dropped. That said PlotMe might work, it might not, it might encounter errors. If there is a official release of PlotMe for 1.13, support will be added.

**Warning:** If you are using CoreProtect, please disable CoreProtect WorldEdit integration. There is a bug in CoreProtect. To enable WorldEdit block change log using CoreProtect please install BlocksHub.

**Please read:**
Unfortunately from what I can tell only ActionBarAPI, BountifulAPI and TitleManager are available for 1.13. Therefore I would like to hear your opinion what progress display plugins you would like to see in AWE (I need a link).

# How to upgrade:
* remove AWE injector,
* remove the old AWE
* remove the *plugins/asyncworldedit/plugins* directory
* remove the *plugins/asyncworldedit/installed* file
* install the new jar and restart the server.

# Changelog:

* Compatibility fix for p2.
* Fix ignoring P2 plot restriction on WE operations,
* Fixed undo cleanup time
* Minor refactor in logs

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.6.0-rc-03
body:
# Release notes:
This release is a release candidate version for Minecraft (Spigot) 1.13, 1.13.1 , 1.13.2 it won't work on any older version of Minecraft. For Minecraft 1.12 and older please use [old version 3.5.4](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/releases/tag/v3.5.4).

The version was built against WorldEdit v7.0.0-beta-03 and won't work with any older build. It was tested on the latest spigot (MC: 1.13.2). As of now nightly/dev builds of WorldEdit won't be supported. Only beta and final releases of WorldEdit will be supported.

**For everyone using PlotMe:** as I already said support for PlotMe is officially dropped. That said PlotMe might work, it might not, it might encounter errors. If there is a official release of PlotMe for 1.13, support will be added.

**Warning:** If you are using CoreProtect, please disable CoreProtect WorldEdit integration. There is a bug in CoreProtect. To enable WorldEdit block change log using CoreProtect please install BlocksHub.

**Please read:**
Unfortunately from what I can tell only ActionBarAPI, BountifulAPI and TitleManager are available for 1.13. Therefore I would like to hear your opinion what progress display plugins you would like to see in AWE (I need a link).

# How to upgrade:
* remove AWE injector,
* remove the old AWE
* remove the *plugins/asyncworldedit/plugins* directory
* remove the *plugins/asyncworldedit/installed* file
* install the new jar and restart the server.

# Changelog:

## 3.6.0-alpha-1
* basic support for spigot 1.13.x

## 3.6.0-alpha-2
* integrated the injector into the core plugin
* rewrite of the injector to use at runtime code modification
* restore progress display plugins
* remove PlotMe fix
* loads of small bugfixes and optimizations.

## 3.6.0-alpha-3
* Injector fixes

## 3.6.0-beta-1
* added dependency check when starting the plugin
* changed the plugin load procedure (should increase compatibility)
* fixed coreprotect integration issues
* some small bugfixes and optimizations.

## 3.6.0-beta-2
* fixed error login bug
* better schematic integration

## 3.6.0-beta-3
* fixed error in undo message handling
* added suport for WorldEdit 3908-dd2fcba

## 3.6.0-beta-4
* fix WorldEdit 3908-dd2fcba batching mode.

## 3.6.0-beta-5
* add WorldEdit 3919-93de97d compatibility
* fixed block serialization
* fixed undo not working
* optimized undo memory footprint and speed.

## 3.6.0-beta-6
* fixed bug in class scanner

## 3.6.0-beta-7
* fixed bug in class scanner
* added support for worldedit 3935-f0070c1

## 3.6.0-beta-8
* removed debug code
* fixed bug in class scanner
* added support for worldedit 3935-f0070c1

## 3.6.0-beta-9
*fix smooth brush

## 3.6.0-rc-01
* WorldEdit beta-03 support
* final version of 1.13 API
* refactor of the injector

## 3.6.0-rc-02
* fixed clipboard injector

## 3.6.0-rc-03
* fixed class scanner
* added option to remove empty undo directories at startup

name: AsyncWorldEdit 3.5.4
body:
**This release was developed in association with Craftological ([Spigot](https://www.spigotmc.org/members/craftological.109800/), [PlanetMinecraft](https://www.planetminecraft.com/member/craftological), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/craftological))**


* Fixed paperspigot compatibility
* Fixed version checker
* Fix clipboard command
* Added time for how long the WorldEdit player session is kept
* Added time for how long the undo is kept
* Added automatic undo cleanup 
* Added API to disable async mode for edit session
* Added options to automatically disable async mode for API calls, console commands and unknown player commands. 
* Added support for restore
* Added option to disable undo message
* Added support for rail block cycling
* Updated WorldEdit dependency
* Updated Injector

name: AsyncWorldEdit 2.0.0
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-%5Breleases-before-2017%5D)

Important:
This release has a new configuration file there fore you need to regenerate it.

Changes:
- New license ([please read!](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License))
- Upgraded injector and wrapper classed to WorldEdit 6.0 build 3289-d8622fb (tested up to 3308-a564792)
- Fixed region selections not working from commands
- Fixed code permissions and documentation inconsistency 
- Fixed cancel job command not working
- Added permission groups
- Added 3 variants of configuration reload: all, configuration, permission groups (needed when player perms are changed!)
- Added per permission group job limit
- Added support for PlotMe 0.13g
- Extracted all messages to external file (added support for translations!)
- Use internal player representation instead of UUIDS
- Removed metrics opt out from main configuration file (uses global opt out instead)
- Changed how configuration reload works (it no longer clears all the queued jobs).
- Some code cleanup

name: AsyncWorldEdit 2.0-RC5
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

Changes:
- Updated to WorldEdit 3289-d8622fb 
- Use new Operations-Extent API instead of asyncing EditSession operations
- Added few operations that ware not asynced
- Updated the enabled operations list in the config file

name: AsyncWorldEdit 2.0-RC4
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

Changes:
- Updated to WorldEdit 3205-765d987 (tested on WorldEdit up to 3221-91d3292)
- Use local player list instead of the server list
- Code cleanup and refactoring:
  - moved wrapper classes to corespond to namespaces in WorldEdit
  - made AsyncWorld (old: WorldExtent) reusable
  - extracted tasks dispatcher
- Changed how progress bar works
- Added ThreadSafeEditSession (obtainable from AsyncEditSessionFactory)
- Added "PerformAsAsyncJob" function to BlockPlacer

name: AsyncWorldEdit 2.0-RC3
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

Changes:
Fixed brush mask handling

name: AsyncWorldEdit 2.0-RC2
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

Changes:
ADD: Added dynamic block placing speed
ADD: Added maximum time AWE can spend on placing blocks
ADD: Added block filtering before placing - ignore same blocks
ADD: Added ClassFactory ( needed by ClipboardCommands injector)
ADD: Added asynced clipboard copy
ADD: Added WaitFor class used to force sequence for some asynced operations (cut = copy + set(0))
FIX: Fixed tree/forest generation
FIX: Fixed injected blocks not being queued
FIX: Fixed block get task not stopping correctly
FIX: Fixed paste not saving to undo
FIX: Fixed world regen not working in async
FIX: Fixed clipboard operations ignoring toggle off and disabled in config

**Notice: Update your config if you want all the new options!**

name: AsyncWorldEdit 1.5
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

FIX: Fixed block get task not stopping correctly
FIX: Fixed clipboard operations ignoring async off state.

name: AsyncWorldEdit 1.4
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

FIX: Fixed forest/tree generation causing server crash.

name: AsyncWorldEdit 2.0-RC1
body:
[License](https://github.com/SBPrime/AsyncWorldEdit/wiki/License-MIT)

First release candidate for new WorldEdit API. 

To install this build copy: AsyncWorldEdit.jar and AsyncWorldEditInjector.jar into your plugins folder.

To use this version you need one of the dev builds of WorldEdit. 
This build was tested with WorldEdit 3132-36c02ae and 3165-75b9f3e. 
This build is not compatible with the old WorldEdit API
